title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Virtual Museum
body: Nez Perce National Historical Park Virtual Museum       An object can tell a story. Whether its the simple contours of cornhusk bag or the rich and intricate lines of glass beads on a hide dress, these items help tell the story of the Nez Perce. Over 200 items from the museum collection were photographed and provide a glimpse into the rich culture and history of the Nez Perce. To access the museum, just push this link and it will take you right there. Enjoy!
